    public class textPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Title : textPanel.java Description : This class contains prompt message label and combobox for ExtraCredit.

      构造器和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • textPanel

        public textPanel(int number)
        This is the constructor that adds text label and possible answer combobox into a panel.
        参数:
        number - the total number of possible answers.

    • 方法详细资料

      • textRight

        public void textRight()
        This is the method which will be excuted when the answer is right. It can change the prompt message of text label.

      • textWrong

        public void textWrong()
        This is the method will be excuted when the answer is wrong. It can change the prompt message of text label.

      • textChange

        public void textChange()
        This is the method will be excuted when a image disappears. It can change the prompt message of text label.

      • getInputNum

        public int getInputNum()
        This method will return the number that user chooses from the combobox.
        返回:
        int the number of user's choice.
